name: Scene Painter
description:
Just a fun project I made, so I have something for Itch. Spent around 2 days on it, however I am pleased with it. Controls :

LeftJoystick Left,  A - Left 

LeftJoystick Right, D - Right 

SPACE, Cross/A/B -Jump

L1, R1/ 1, 2 - Cycle Item (There are 7)

L2, Left Mouse - Break

R2 , Right Mouse,- Place

RightJoystick, Mouse- Aim pointer

R, Start- Reset Camera and pointer

Select, Tab - Toggle Flying

Flying:

    LeftJoystick/W,A,S,D

Dpad/arrowkeys - MoveCamera

R3, L3/+, -,  - Camera Zoom

Triangle, Y / 3 - Time Dilation  

Circle, B, A / 4 - Natural Time Toggle 

If you have a phone with controller support, then you are able to run this.
